products.short_description: Streamline team connections with our intuitive Organizational Directory. Centralize contact info, boost communication, and stay updated—all in one place.
products.full_description: Elevate your team’s connectivity with our Organizational Directory Product. Seamlessly centralize employee info, streamline communication, and access real-time updates—all in one intuitive platform. Stay connected and enhance collaboration effortlessly.

features.title: Text Search Filtering
features.description: Effortlessly locate individuals using keyword searches, ensuring quick and accurate access to specific contacts.

features.title: Geographic Filtering
features.description: Find contacts based on their country of residence, making it easier to manage and connect with a global workforce.

features.title: Departmental Filtering
features.description: Seamlessly navigate through team members by selecting their department, enhancing departmental coordination and efficiency.

features.title: Flexible Display Modes
features.description: Choose from various viewing options including cards, list, grid, hierarchy, or alphabetical order. Tailor the directory’s presentation to fit your preferences and needs, whether for detailed overviews or streamlined browsing.
